title: Flip
desc: All <:rgby:1107167371048788028> cards and colors who specify they can be flipped (<:inferno:1118594776716021780>) will be flipped. Revealing a **random <:rgby:1107167371048788028><:inferno:1118594776716021780> card converted to the color specified to be flipped**, they are also maked as Flipped, if another Flip occurs Flipped cards go back to their original card.
